https://tmrev.io/movie/447111-Athens Blues 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cc8BCNIQv1lyNn1bTfhOSrp7TM2.jpg A group of men in their sixties that spend the August nights in Athens outside a pharmacy during night shift, an ambulance driver who has an affair with a younger girl, a middle-aged couple who have invented a lie to renew their passion for one another, a child pretending to sleepwalk in the streets of Athens, two younger people who are tied together in an office after a burglar attack, and other amorous encounters during the same night. Athens Blues
